price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߟߏ߲ ߘߌ߫ ، ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߘߌߦߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߦߌߟߊ߫ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߡߊ߬ ߞߋߟߋ߲߬
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
